title: The Tax Bill Compared To Other Very Expensive Things
summary:
Key ideas
- The current GOP tax bill is expensive and its cost is compared to other really expensive things.
- The author believes that people focus too much on expensive plans that try to help people and not enough on plans that won't help anyone.
- The author suggests that there might be a lack of attention being paid to the GOP tax plan because there is a lack of benefits for the majority of people.

Key learnings
- There is concern that there isn't enough attention being paid to the GOP tax plan.
- The author suggests that it is important to pay attention to cost and the benefits of a plan.

Key questions
- Are people too focused on scrutinizing expensive plans that try to help people?
- Should there be more scrutiny given to plans that won't help anyone?
- Is there a lack of attention being paid to the GOP tax plan because it won't benefit the majority of people?
